info.name: BookStore API collection
info.description: 온라인 서점 백엔드 API - FastAPI + MySQL + Redis

response.name: 409 - 중복회원가입
response.body:
{
    "timestamp": "2025-12-14T12:10:13",
    "path": "/auth/signup",
    "status": 409,
    "code": "USER_ALREADY_EXISTS",
    "message": "User with email 'Email already registered' already exists",
    "details": null
}

response.name: 409 - 중복 판매자 등록
response.body:
{
    "timestamp": "2025-12-14T12:17:24",
    "path": "/sellers/",
    "status": 409,
    "code": "SELLER_ALREADY_EXISTS",
    "message": "You already have a seller profile",
    "details": null
}

response.name: 409 - 중복 도서 등록
response.body:
{
    "timestamp": "2025-12-14T12:35:05",
    "path": "/books/",
    "status": 409,
    "code": "BOOK_ALREADY_EXISTS",
    "message": "Book with this ISBN already exists",
    "details": null
}

response.name: 409 - 중복 항목 추가
response.body:
{
    "timestamp": "2025-12-14T12:40:14",
    "path": "/carts/",
    "status": 409,
    "code": "CART_ITEM_ALREADY_EXISTS",
    "message": "This book is already in your cart",
    "details": null
}

response.name: 201 - 주문 생성
200 - 주문 취소
403 - 미구매책 리뷰 작성
response.body:
{
    "timestamp": "2025-12-14T12:50:16",
    "path": "/books/2/reviews",
    "status": 403,
    "code": "REVIEW_NOT_ALLOWED",
    "message": "This order item is not for this book",
    "details": null
}

response.name: 409 - 중복 리뷰 작성
response.body:
{
    "timestamp": "2025-12-14T12:49:32",
    "path": "/books/1/reviews",
    "status": 409,

}

response.name: 409 - 중복 찜 추가
response.body:
{
    "timestamp": "2025-12-14T13:00:32",

    "status": 409,

}
